options.name: Reaction : Guidance
options.description: In response to an Ally being the Target of an Attack Roll, grant them a 1d4 Bonus to their Defensive Checks until the start of their turn.

options.name: Free Action : Forced March
options.description: You command an Ally to Move up to 2 Units without provoking Reactions.

options.name: Lead from the Front
options.description: Gain +1 Physical Mitigation, +2 Psychic Mitigation and +2 Health

options.name: Free Action : Lead by Example
options.description: When you land a killing blow on an Enemy, you can grant an Ally within 10 Units Temporary Health equal to your Persuasion Modifier. If the killing blow was a True Hit, you gain a Heroic Action.

options.name: Coordinator
options.description: If two or more Allies are within 1 Unit of a target, all Melee Attacks on that target have a +2 Attack Bonus
